titles: The manifold vvisedome of God In the divers dispensation of grace by Iesus Christ, In the Old New Testament. In the covenant of faith. workes. Their agreement and difference. By G. Walker, B.D. pastor of Saint Iohn the Evangelist in Watlingstreet.
author: Walker, George, 1581?-1651.
publisher: printed by R. H[odgkinson] for Iohn Bartlet, and are to be solde at the signe of the Gilt Cup, neere S. Austins Gate in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: The epistle dedicatory signed: George Walker.
With errata on verso of imprimatur leaf.
In the title the words "Old New" and "faith. workes." are joined by left braces.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
